text:
Announcing Phase III of Texas' plan to safely open the economy while containing the spread of #COVID19
 
As with previous phases, the Phase III plan is based on the advice and support of the four doctors on the @GSF_OpenTexas medical team. 

https://t.co/LMeNl1H90m https://t.co/adpU9sDDzt
